 Say goodbye to line-ups, buy your transit fares on line.   With your OPUS card reader, no need to go anywhere – purchase your fares at home, at any time of day or night, 24/7.  No more rushing at the last minute!   Prior to using  OPUS en ligne , you must first purchase a card reader for $14.49 plus taxes. Afterwards, you will enjoy these benefits:   Flexibility : reload fares on your OPUS card or review its content using your computer from the comfort of your home.   Time saving : avoid potential line-ups at fare vending machines (DAT), transit service points or retail sales points (convenience stores, pharmacies).   Practical : reload the OPUS card of each family member – you only need one card reader   We recommend that you check computer system requirements prior to purchasing an OPUS card reader.   Purchase a card reader   Buy transit fares   Requirements   Using the  OPUS en ligne  service requires:   A computer with required configuration ( see technical assistance )   An OPUS card reader   An  OPUS card   A valid email address   A credit card (VISA, MasterCard)   Regular debit cards, debit VISA cards and prepaid credit cards are not accepted.   Please note transactions are secured with  VERIFIED by VISA  and  MasterCard SecureCode  services.     Audio browsing using screen reader is not available. We are working to find solutions to make OPUS en ligne website comply with level AA of the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.     FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
